description: Create Step domain entity and StepStatus enum
acceptance_criteria: StepStatus enum has values: PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, FAILED, SKIPPED
Step dataclass has fields: task_id, project_id, phase, description, status, major_version, minor_version
Step.from_dict() class method parses JSON structure with validation.status
Step.to_dict() method serializes to JSON-compatible dict
major_version and minor_version are parsed from task_id (e.g., '01-02' -> 1, 2)

implementation_notes.overview: Create the core domain model following hexagonal architecture
key_requirements: Handle task_id parsing with error handling
Status mapping from validation.status in JSON
